input.sentences: when [female] and [male] got married | the whole focus was on the wedding .
but a lot of the stories were behind the scenes . like [female] ' sister lexus flying in from location .
and amadeus showing up out of nowhere to surprise his old girlfriend [female] .
which he did | and they hit it off wonderfully and got back together .
and of course there was [male] and [female] who i swear were drunk the entire time .
output.sentences: The director gave an amazing speech after it was over.
